page.title: 07HOUSING - NEW ST. GLOUCESTER
page.content: NEW ST. CONSISTS OF TWO PARALLEL TERRACES OF BRICK BUILT,SLATE ROOFED HOUSES,110 YEARS OLD. MY HOME HAS 3 BEDROOMS AND DOWNSTAIRS IS A KITCHEN LOUNGE AND A DINING ROOM. IN 1963 A BATHROOM WAS ADDED AND RECENTLY A SHOWER UNIT. MY FRONT DOOR OPENS STRAIGHT ONTO THE PAVEMENT AND AS THE GARDEN IS SMALL I PLAY IN THE PARK. MY PARENTS ARE SAVING SPACE BY FITTING BUILT-IN BEDROOM FURNITURE,OUR CENTRAL HEATING USES SMOKELESS FUEL BUT WE USE MAINS ELECTRICITY FOR LIGHTING,RADIO, TV,REFIGERATION,COOKING AND LAUNDRY & MY DAD'S POWER TOOLS. OUR NARROW STREET LOSES SUNLIGHT AND CARS PARKED ON BOTH SIDES HINDERS TRAFFIC. WE HAVE DOUBLE GLAZED WINDOWS TO KEEP US WARM AND TO REDUCE STREET NOISE. WE WATCH TV A LOT AS A FAMILY.
